comments.body: The 'l' looks a lot like '1', might want to use a different variable name.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +296,300 @@        # should be a tuple (immutable) of base type integers.
        a = np.array([1, 2, 3], dtype=np.int16)
        l = [1, 2, 3]
        # Array gets converted
        dt = np.dtype([('a', 'f4', a)])

comments.body: So 'l' is the shape of the subarray?
